c74object.name: ears.model.sps.analysis~
c74object.description: Applies the Essentia sinusoidal-plus-residual analysis model

outlet.digest: Frequencies @description List of frequencies (one level for each channel, then one level for each frame)
outlet.description: List of frequencies (one level for each channel, then one level for each frame)

outlet.digest: Magnitudes @description List of magnitudes (one level for each channel, then one level for each frame)
outlet.description: List of magnitudes (one level for each channel, then one level for each frame)

outlet.digest: Phases @description List of phases (one level for each channel, then one level for each frame)
outlet.description: List of phases (one level for each channel, then one level for each frame)

outlet.digest: Stochastic envelopes @description Stochastic envelope (one level for each channel, then one level for each frame).
outlet.description: Stochastic envelope (one level for each channel, then one level for each frame).

method.name: list/llll
method.description: A list or llll with buffer names will trigger the buffer processing and output the processed buffer names (depending on the naming attribute).

attribute.name: downmix
attribute.description: Toggles the ability to downmix all the channels into one. If this flag is not set, then one buffer per channel is output. By default downmix is 0.

attribute.name: freqdevoffset
attribute.description: Sets the minimum frequency deviation at 0Hz

attribute.name: freqdevslope
attribute.description: Sets the slope increase of minimum frequency deviation

attribute.name: magnitudethreshold
attribute.description: Peaks below this given threshold are not outputted (in the ampunit).

attribute.name: maxfrequency
attribute.description: Sets the maximum frequency of the range to evaluate (in the frequnit).

attribute.name: maxnsines
attribute.digest: Maximum Number of Sines per Frame
attribute.description: Sets the maximum number of sines per frame.

attribute.name: label
attribute.value: Maximum Number of Sines per Frame

attribute.name: maxpeaks
attribute.description: Sets the maximum number of returned peaks.

attribute.name: minfrequency
attribute.description: Sets the minimum frequency of the range to evaluate (in the frequnit).

attribute.name: orderby
attribute.description: Sets the peak ordering type (either "frequency" or "magnitude").

attribute.name: stocf
attribute.description: Sets the decimation factor used for the stochastic approximation.

entry.name: Outlet 1 (llll)
entry.description: Frequencies @description List of frequencies (one level for each channel, then one level for each frame). List of frequencies (one level for each channel, then one level for each frame)

entry.name: Outlet 2 (llll)
entry.description: Magnitudes @description List of magnitudes (one level for each channel, then one level for each frame). List of magnitudes (one level for each channel, then one level for each frame)

entry.name: Outlet 3 (llll)
entry.description: Phases @description List of phases (one level for each channel, then one level for each frame). List of phases (one level for each channel, then one level for each frame)

entry.name: Outlet 4 (llll)
entry.description: Stochastic envelopes @description Stochastic envelope (one level for each channel, then one level for each frame).. Stochastic envelope (one level for each channel, then one level for each frame).
